experience.description: Fixed alioth template performance issues in React for an IT Company

During my five month internship, I had the oppurtunity to witness an entire professional work flow. Working within teams, following a schedule, discussing about the improvements needed, following a pipeline for every code commit , resolving conflicts, code reviews , deployment , various environments like local, staging, live. Learning about Bitbucket and Docker was the most amazing thing i did. The other interesting thing i learned that they maintained their own package for everthing. The code organization is just truely amazing with this approach. For Frontend: React JS, SCSS, Mockoon for delievering backend props, Hypernove SSR Rendering, Global State Management Library like Redux, Redux Saga. For Backend: PHP, Laravel, Postman endpoint testing, Doctrine, SQL Workbench, PHP Unit Testing.  For Databases: MySQL, Mongo DB, Redis (key-value pair store). Learning, all these new things it just enlightened me with how the professional work is carried out.
